DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the pharmacokinetics of NVP-1203 and coadministration of aceclofenac and eperisone HCl SR.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Compare Pharmacokinetic Characteristics of Eperisone and Aceclofenac With NVP-1203
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteers, age between 19 and 45 BMI of ＞19kg/m2 and ＜28kg/m2 subject Informed of the investigational nature of this study and voluntarily agree to participate in this study Use of any prescription medication within 14 days prior to Day 1 Use of any medication within 7 days prior to Day 1
